page.title: 07ST. JOHN'S CHURCH,COTEHILL
page.content: Our church is called St.John's. Our church is about 120 years old. We have a Sunday school called the Young Eagles .It is called that because the symbol for St. John is an eagle.The church has an odd shaped tower built at the side. Our school goes across to the church on Ascension Day for a special service in which children from our school read the lesson and read special prayers they have written.Sometimes we play recorder for the hymns. Our vicar is called Canon Wingate. He also comes into school once a fortnight for our school assembly.
